    Basic Usage

Basic Usage

Source: vignettes/basic-usage.Rmd
basic-usage.Rmd
library(wdauto)

Add one to any value

This is the first tool of our wonderful package. You can add 1 to any value using function add_one().

get_cd 

get_cd(dest_dir = "C:/Users/Dell/Desktop/test/test")
#> ● An appropriate version of chromedriver.exe is already present.

That’s it ! This the end of the documented story of our package. All components are there.

Add one to any value

This is the first tool of our wonderful package. You can add 1 to any value using function add_one().

get_seleniumserver 

get_ss(dest_dir = "C:/Users/Dell/Desktop/test/test")
#> ● You have already downloaded the .jar file in  C:/Users/Dell/Desktop/test/test/selenium/4.0 .

auto_cs 

auto_cs(dest_dir = "C:/Users/Dell/Desktop/test/test")
#> ● Chrome browser was installed on this computer. 
#> ● Java is installed on this computer.
#> ● New selenium server process created.

reset_cs 

auto_cs(dest_dir = "C:/Users/Dell/Desktop/test/test")
#> ● Chrome browser was installed on this computer. 
#> ● Java is installed on this computer.
#> ● Old selenium server process with PID 5824 terminated.
#> ● New selenium server process created.
reset_cs()
#> ● Selenium server process with PID 18980 terminated.
#> ● No Chromedriver process found.
#> ● Startup .bat file removed.
